meanings.definition: The presence of phosphates in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor detected phosphaturias in the urine sample.
meanings.sent2: Phosphaturias can indicate certain health conditions.
meanings.sent3: The phosphaturias in the urine seemed to sparkle under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her urine was like a treasure trove of phosphaturias.
meanings.sent5: The phosphaturias in the urine glowed like tiny stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Excretion of phosphates in the urine.
meanings.sent1: Excessive phosphaturias may lead to mineral imbalances.
meanings.sent2: The body's regulation of phosphaturias is crucial for health.
meanings.sent3: The phosphaturias in the urine waved goodbye as they were flushed away.
meanings.sent4: His body expelled the phosphaturias like unwanted guests.
meanings.sent5: The stream of phosphaturias in the urine was like a river flowing out of the body.
